DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate wear two different polyethylene liner ( E-Poly ArcomXL , Biomet inc. ) primary total hip arthroplasty . This study divide one main study three sub-studies . - The main study investigates wear liner use radiostereometric analysis ( RSA ) five year follow-up . A two year follow-up analysis report . - Other study ) investigate cup migration respect pelvis two different femoral head size ( 32- 36-mm ) , ii ) clinical outcome score ( Harris Hip Score , SF-36 , UCLA , EQ5D ) also evaluate . An explorative study conduct investigate possibility use bi-plane technique RSA detect rigid body segment hip reduction roentgen dose .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Polyethylene Wear , Migration Clinical Outcome Total Hip Replacement
DOC.criteria: Primary unilateral uncemented Primary idiopathic arthritis , 40 to70 year age , Cupsize 54mm Anteversion nonstandard stem use , Dysplasia ( Centeredge angle Wiberg < 20 degree ) , Malignant condition , Prior radiotherapy , Physical psychological condition ( state department 's standard operation procedure ) , Complications surgery ( require screw shell femoral cerclage )
